item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies. Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.99 - $6.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:39:08 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies.

Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to make a better life for pets with every pet owner.

cat feeder, cat cone, cat door

pet supplies

pet toys, pet carrier sling

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.37 x 5.43 x 2.17 inches; 5.61 Ounces
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Depets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08FJ655HL

Great Brush, Healthy Pets. The cat grooming brush with round beads can do massage for your pets and prevent scratching your pet’s skin. The design of stainless steel needles with a 60-degree bend and some elasticity is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.
One-click Cleaning Button. You just have to Simply push the button and the hair will be super simple removed from the cat hair brush. Furthermore, our dog grooming brush is washable, which can be kept in clean.
Comfortable and Nonslip Handle. Our cat shedding brush is designed with a comfort-grip and nonslip handle, and this self cleaning cat brush also has a massage function for your hand and you won’t get tired easily when you brush your pet.
Enjoyable Brushing Experience. Grooming pets can strengthen communication and further the bond between you and your pets. Our pet brush is suitable for all breeds and coat types. With Depets dog and cat shedding brush, your beloved pet will enjoy the time of grooming.

From a variety kind of pet brushes, I chose this one for my own lovely pets (Yoyo & Yiyi). Every time I brush Yiyi, she rubs my hand and makes enjoyable meow. As for my doggy Yoyo, she always has a happy face when I do this to her. We all love this cat and dog shedding brush, so I want to share it with every pet owner and I hope you and your beloved pet will enjoy it like us.

Washable:Washable feature keep the brush hygienic

Size: 7.7″ ×4.1″(L×W)

Color: blue + white

Material: Stainless steel + ABS Plastic + Rubber

Read more

The round end of the needles can do massage for your pets without scratching his/her skins, which is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.

The comfort-grip handle is designed to prevent hand and wrist strain.

Read more

Valuable Brush. This cat slicker brush can easily remove loose hair, shedding Mats, tangled hair, Dander and Dirt of your lovely pets, our cat brushes for indoor cats not only keep your pets clean, but also provide you with a hygienic home environment.

Healthy Pet. The dog shedding brush with round beads can increase blood circulation and keep your pet’s coat soft and shiny.

Read more

Usage

Step1: Brush your pet with gentle move.

Step2: Click the button.

Step3: Remove the hair from the pet brush.

Read more

How to reduce the pain during brushing?

  1. Hold the hair root with one hand, comb along the direction of hair growth with the other hand;
  2. When the hair knots are serious behind the ears and on the neck, the movements should be gentle;
  3. Comb the long hair layer by layer, turning the outer layer over and combing the inner layer.

What if my pet doesn’t like this dog and cat hair brush?

You can guide with snack, lengthen the grooming time every day, our self cleaning slicker brush is gentle and not stimulating, your cute pet will gradually like it.

Note:

  1. Store out of reach of children.
  2. Stress may cause skin irritation, you should brush your pet gently.
  3. Be careful with pets that suffer from skin irritation or weak skin sensitivity.

Read more

4.5
Price: $15.99 - $6.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:39:08 UTC – Details)

Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:36 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Love Pets Love DELOMO

pet supplies

Delomo was named after two pets. It all began in the summer of 2013 when Matt took a stray kitten home and named her Lomo. Lomo brought Matt a really purr-fect life. Later, they got another partner, an adopted puppy. Matt called him Desko. From then on they three became inseparable friends. They played and napped together. “All pets deserve a safe & loving home”. With this faith in mind, Matt created DELOMO intending to help more fur babies.

What inspires us:

We feel bound to help homeless animals and bring them a better life. All pets deserve a safe & loving home without being abandoned or euthanized.

What we are doing:

Big change starts small. We regularly provide assistance to the American Association of Pet Shelters. We believe that love will make a difference.

Why we did this:

Because we CARE. We care for life and our communities. We’ve been dedicated to sending everlasting love to all our pets, employees, and new fur-baby parents just like you. That’s why we take our products seriously.

Pet Hair Remover

pet grooming gloves

pet grooming gloves

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11.26 x 7.95 x 0.71 inches; 4.97 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ DLO-PairGloves-Green
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 24, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ DELOMO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07XM62WLS

ENHANCED FIVE FINGER DESIGN: Our shedding glove allows you to gently clean sensitive hard-to-reach places, like face, tail or legs. Soft & longer silicone tips for grooming your pets better. No more worry about those short tips couldn’t reach your furry babies’ skin
EASIER TO CLEAN: The grooming glove has a special layer of coating on the silicon. The pet hair could easily peel off from glove. Time saving and a wonderful gift for pet owners. Machine washable hair removal glove keeps your house clean and tidy.
FITS MOST OF THE PEOPLE: This pet hair remover with premium mesh material and adjustable strap size. Adjustable wrist straps according to the width of your wrist. The fast dry mesh will not make your hands sweaty
WARM TIPS: Stroke your pet with this machine washable gloves back and forth for several times to collect more hair. Spray a bit of water on the surface of silicone before using for better effects








Pet Water Fountain
Large Surface Lint Roller
Dog Travel Bag
Pet Grooming Gloves a Pair
Pet Grooming Gloves 1PC
Pet Hair Remover
Color Name White White Grey Blue Blue White

Still chasing your pets to brush them? Cleaning regularly but hairball ends up everywhere? Love you pets but hate the loose hair?

Say goodye to pet hair mess in the house. Delomo offers a better hair glove for these issues. Making grooming your pets as easy as take a breath. Enjoy a happy time with your furry friends when they get a massage and you’re free from the mess of hair everywhere.

Read more

DELOMO NEW PET HAIR REMOVER GLOVES

Effective to Remove Hair

A special layer of coating on the silicon which makes it much easier to clean the residual hair. You can peel off the accumulated hair simply.

Collects More Pets Hair

Delomo pet grooming glove with higher silicon tips, you could collect more hair now. No more worry about those short tips couldn’t reach you fury babe’s skin.

Ergonomic 5 Fingers Design

This upgraded pet glove has enhanced 5 fingers design allows you to gently clean sensitive hard-to-reach places, like face, tail or legs.

Easier to Clean the Glove

The grooming glove is hand and machine washable. You could throw it into the wash machine in gentle cycle and get a clean glove in several minutes later.

Read more

item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.95
(as of Nov 29,2022 23:31:45 UTC – Details)

Product Description

MORE WAGS & MORE SMILES AQUAPAW PETS ARE HAPPY PETS

Among the dogs, cats, and other furry pals in our recent poll, Aquapaw is the paws-down favorite brand. Aquapaw bathing tools and lick mats take the scary out of things like baths and vet visits. Dogs love to smell good, of course, and Sparky’s skin doesn’t itch after an Aquapaw bath. Arf!

HAPPY PETS HAVE HAPPY HUMANS

Humans like it when their pets are happy. That’s why humans choose Aquapaw. Aquapaw baths are less messy than bucket baths. Vet visits and grooming sessions are just easier, with Slow Treater lick mats. And hey, it turns out humans also love it when dogs smell good. It’s a win-win situation.

EASY WAYS TO MAKE BATH TIME BETTER

1 Pro Pet Bather 2 Original Pet Bather 3 Slow Treater 4 Slow Treater XL 5 Feeding Mats

The Aquapaw Pet Bathing Tool

Simplify the dog bathing process at your home, with Aquapaw. Our combination sprayer/scrubber saves water, produces less mess, and helps your dog feel comfortable. All at the same time. Aquapaw is easy to install and operate. Can be used inside or outside.

PICK THE RIGHT SPRAYER FOR YOUR 4-LEGGED FRIEND

Eliminates mess and stress: As seen on Shark Tank, this all-in-one tool lets you brush and rinse your pet simultaneously, for faster bathing with no need for bucket rinsing. The button mechanism lets you click easily from ON to OFF with one hand, leaving your other hand free to soothe your pet
Indoor/outdoor use: Comes with adapters to fit shower spigot or garden hose, so you can easily create a small animal grooming station indoors in your tub or a large animal shower outside. Includes 8-foot hose
Ergonomic design: With its one-size-fits-all design, Aquapaw straps securely to either hand. The ON/OFF button rests in your palm, for ease of operation. The strap adjusts easily to fit all hand sizes
Quality materials and a great gift: The scrubber tool is 100% FDA-grade silicone – strong enough for scrubbing thick fur, yet soft enough to be gentle on your pet’s sensitive areas

From the brand

High Quality Car Cleaning Kit

You don’t need to waste time looking for a separate cleaning tool. Make your cleaning easier, faster and more efficient.

Car Detailing Cleaning Kit

【COMPLETE CAR INTERIOR CLEANING KIT】The car Interior detailing supplies kit includes car vacuum*1,cleaning gel*1, windshield cleaning tool*1,replaceable microfiber pads*2, 100ml spray bottle*1, car detailing brushes*5, car dash duster brush*1, air vents brush*2, microfiber towels*2, durable tool storage bag*1.You don’t need to waste time looking for a separate cleaning tool. Make your cleaning easier, faster and more efficient.
【STRONG SUCTION AND BRIGHT LED LIGHT】Car vacuum cleaner adopt 120W power motor, can provide almost 7500Pa ultra-strong suction, which allows to easily pick up dirt, crumbs, and pet hair from the car with outstanding cleaning performance.This handheld vacuum features a bright LED Light which is helpful for the dark cleaning and corner cleaning.Vacuum cleaner cord is 16.4 feet long and comes with 4 accessories (auxiliary connector, long nozzle, brush nozzle, extension hose).
【CAR INTERIOR CARE KIT】 Car cleaning gel, dashboard dust brush, microfiber towels and air outlet brushes can be used with car vacuum cleaner to remove dust from the surface of the car. Car windshield cleaning tool is designed with an extended handle and a rotatable triangular head, which is convenient for cleaning the bottom of the window or some difficult-to-clean areas. 5 different sizes of premium detail brushes make it easy to explore tight spaces, lug nuts and any other hard-to-reach areas.
【PREMIUM MATERIAL & HUMANIZED DESIGN】These car cleaning supplies are made from fine material to be soft,sturdy and durable.Absolutely safe to clean on delicate surfaces. The car cleaning kit is ergonomically designed and will not cause fatigue to your hands or arms after long hours of work.All car cleaning kit tools are packed in an Oxford bag, which is very convenient and space-saving. You can place it anywhere in the trunk or back seat.
【PERFECT GIFT FOR CAR LOVERS】: Say goodbye to the constant hassle of removing dust, dirt or stubborn stains with the Lezcufer car cleaning Interior detailing kit, designed for car interior use! It can be a great gift for any car buffs or new car owners.Make car cleaning to become a simple thing. 

Car Detailing Kit

Say goodbye to the constant hassle of removing dust, dirt or stubborn stains with the Lezcufer car cleaning Interior detailing kit, designed for carinterior and exterior use. The professional choice for car lovers! It can be a great gift for any car buffs or new car owners.

COMPLETE CAR INTERIOR CLEANING KIT

You don’t need to waste time looking for a separate cleaning tool. All car cleaning kit tools are packed in an Oxford bag, which is very convenient and space-saving. Make your cleaning easier, faster and more efficient.

includes： car vacuum*1,cleaning gel*1, windshield cleaning tool*1,replaceable microfiber pads*2, 100ml spray bottle*1, car detailing brushes*5, car dash duster brush*1, air vents brush*2, microfiber towels*2, durable tool storage bag*1.

Read more

High Quality Motor

Our car vacuum cleaner adopts 120W/12V high-power motor with a strong suction power of up to 7500PA, the noise is controlled below 70DB, it can be used both wet and dry, which easily remove dust, sand, paper debris, hair, food scraps or spilled liquids.

Significant-Efficiency Cleaning

Using high-quality, durable ABS, the suction is stable and the noise is low. Washable, reusable HEPA filter, greener and more durable. Strong suction, while improving cleaning efficiency, it can meet the needs of deep cleaning, maximize the effect, save time and effort.

Unique LED Light Design

Built-in bright LED lights provide great visibility when you’re cleaning corners, car seat bottoms, and other hard-to-see places. Helps you clean quickly in the dark, bringing a lot of convenience to cleaning work.

From the brand

The Brand That Works

For over 20 years we have grown to provide products to suit your every need.

Our products are the foundation of a strong boot & shoe-care line.

We value our customers greatly, and we hope you’ll agree that JobSite is “The Brand That Works”.

How did we get our start?

JobSite was founded by experts in shoe care and repair. The owners designed and sold products in brick and mortar stores around the country before expanding to online marketplaces such as Amazon.

What makes our products unique?

Our team’s experience in the industry helps us design high quality and affordable products. We stand behind our products.

What problem are we solving?

Our products are built as tough as the people that buy them. They work great on the job or at home.

Affordable, quality products

Products built to last…

NO MOUNTING REQUIRED: Side step plates keep it in place without bolting down
EXTRA WIDE: Wide design can fit large boots
BUILT TO LAST: Heavy Duty high density composite molded plastic sides & welded metal frame make this scraper able to withstand all weather elements without rotting or cracking
ALL WEATHER: Other brands use wood edges that rot and crack when they get wet or exposed to extreme heat and cold, our heavy duty plastic edges will not
TRUSTED BRAND: We guarantee our product will be the best you have ever owned or we will provide a full refund
